Wow, this version works smooth and saves too.Thanks.. The "Reloaded" version worked but didn't save.Besides that the Reloaded version had a hack tool.  Running Win. 7-64 Radeon 5670 graphics. For those with crash problem try lowering the graphics level.

@blackjackel2 problem fixed. Go to options and disable multiplayer, switch to single. Game loads and you can play but you may encounter a new problem. An awful bugged noise after the ship escape which keeps up in playable and in cutscene content

Hey guys, i found where the save files are! 

C:ProgramDataRELOADEDRLD!216250storageout

Jeez it took ages to find this...

Oops it didnt add the slashes before. Here it is
C:ProgramData/RELOADED/RLD!/216250/storage/out
Works perfectly, to launch, just run it in admin :) thanks you very much

Thanks! works 100%. Had to tell my Anti Virus to ignore the False Positive on that steam.dll. Then run it as Admin. Set to single player in game to stop crashes. All simple stuff.
Do all of the above and you got yourself a 100% working pirate dead island riptide. Cheers.
